item.title: Principales Indicadores Económicos de Chile
item.description: Principales Indicadores Económicos USD UF Cobre USD Line Chart var ctx = document.getElementById('227').getContext('2d'); var options = { type: 'line', data: { labels: Utils.months({count: data.labels.length + 1}), datasets: [ { label: 'Dataset 1', data: Utils.numbers(NUMBER_CFG), borderColor: Utils.CHART_COLORS.red, backgroundColor: Utils.transparentize(Utils.CHART_COLORS.red, 0.5), }, { label: 'Dataset 2', data: Utils.numbers(NUMBER_CFG), borderColor: Utils.CHART_COLORS.blue, backgroundColor: Utils.transparentize(Utils.CHART_COLORS.blue, 0.5), } ] }, options: { responsive: true, plugins: { legend: { position: 'top', }, title: { display: true, text: 'Valores USD' } } } }; new Chart(ctx, options); USD var ctx = document.
